Content.Content:
[$BOX] [$CELL] [$BLOCK]

Basophils

Basophilic granulocytes cannot phagocytise foreign cells. They, however, produce molecules that attract neutrophils and eosinophils and play a role in allergic reaction by histamine release.

[$/BLOCK] [$/CELL] [$CELL] [$IMG("/media/Animations/Granulocytes_EN.png";164,300;2)] [$/CELL] [$/BOX]
Content.Name: Basophils
